quote_last: , the director led the guest of honor onto the stage. He watched the four hundred girls rise and applaud him in what the director would have described as a “ladylike” manner.
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: in the evening, and the absurd bell in the six-foot tin steeple of the church went clank-clank, clank- clank! as old Mattu pulled the rope within.
title: Burmese Days
author: George Orwell

quote_last: , and the sun was setting full and warm, and the red light streamed in through the window and gave more colour to the pale cheeks.
title: Dracula
author: Bram Stoker
